mapper.select: select p.product_code,p.name, p.ea, main.name as 'main_cat', mid.name as 'middle_cat', sub.name as 'sub_cat' from category_main main JOIN category_middle mid JOIN category_sub sub JOIN product p on main.id = mid.main_id and mid.id = sub.middle_id where p.category_id = sub.id and p.delyn = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert INTO product (product_code, name, ea, category_id, adduser) values (#{product_code},#{name},#{ea},#{category_id},#{adduser});
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET delyn ='Y' where product_code = #{product_code}
